---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
times = read_csv('point-tables.csv')
```

```{r}
times %>% 
  ggplot(aes(point, pct_correct, color = year)) +
  geom_point() +
  stat_smooth(method="lm", formula = y ~ x + I(x^2) + I(x^3))
```

```{r}
times %>% 
  ggplot(aes(point, pct_correct, color = year, shape = as.factor(year))) +
  stat_smooth(alpha = 0.5, method = "lm", formula = y ~ x + I(x^2) + I(x^3), se = FALSE)
```

```{r}
times %>% 
  filter(year == 1997 | year == 2018) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(point, pct_correct, color = year, shape = as.factor(year))) +
  stat_smooth(alpha = 0.5, method = "lm", formula = y ~ x + I(x^2) + I(x^3), se = FALSE)
```


```{r}
model = lm(pct_correct ~ point + I(point^2) + I(point^3), data = times)
```

```{r}
summary(model)
```

```{r}
predict(model)
```
